insert into bicycle(bicycleNo, memberId, address, purchasePrice, rentPrice, detail, categoryNo) values(#{bicycleNo}, #{memberVO.id}, #{address}, #{purchasePrice}, #{rentPrice}, #{detail}, #{categoryNo})
mapper.select: select categoryName from category where categoryNo=#{categoryNo}
select min(rentPrice) from bicycle where categoryNo=#{value}
select max(rentPrice) from bicycle where categoryNo=#{value}

mapper.insert: insert into possible_day(bicycleNo, startDay, endDay) values(#{bicycleNo}, #{startDay}, #{endDay})
mapper.select: select b.bicycleNo, b.memberId ,b.address ,b.rentPrice, b.categoryNo,c.photo1,c.photo2,c.photo3 from bicycle b, possible_day p, bicycle_photo c where b.address like '%' ||#{address}|| '%' and b.bicycleNo=p.bicycleNo and to_date(#{startDay})>=p.startDay and to_date(#{endDay})<=p.endDay and b.bicycleNo=c.bicycleNo
select b.bicycleNo,b.memberId,b.address,b.purchasePrice,b.rentPrice,b.detail,b.categoryNo,m.phone,m.address from bicycle b,rb_member m where bicycleNo=#{value} and b.memberId=m.id
